ev3dev.hardware.display.spi

Interface FramebufferProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitFramebufferProvider, RGBFramebufferProvider

    public interface FramebufferProvider
    Framebuffer factory service provider
    Since:
    2.4.7

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JavaFramebuffer createFramebuffer(NativeFramebuffer fb, DisplayInterface disp)
      Create and initialize a new framebuffer.
      static JavaFramebuffer load(NativeFramebuffer fb, DisplayInterface disp)
      Initialize system framebuffer

    • Method Detail

      • load

        static JavaFramebuffer load(NativeFramebuffer fb,
                            DisplayInterface disp)
                     throws AllImplFailedException
        Initialize system framebuffer
        Parameters:
        fb - Framebuffer device.
        Returns:
        Initialized framebuffer for the specified path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if no suitable framebuffer is found
        AllImplFailedException

      • createFramebuffer

        JavaFramebuffer createFramebuffer(NativeFramebuffer fb,
                                  DisplayInterface disp)
                           throws LastErrorException,
                                  java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create and initialize a new framebuffer.
        Parameters:
        fb - The framebuffer device (e.g. /dev/fb0)
        disp - Display manager (e.g. /dev/tty)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When this framebuffer is not compatible with this device.
        LastErrorException - When there was an error accessing the device.
